      Methods in Graph with parameters of type Graphs

      void Vertex.removeConnectivityToVertex(Vertex<?> connect, Graphs<?,?> graph)

      void DefaultVertex.updateOtherVertexOfRemoval(Vertex<?> connect, Graphs<?,?> graph) 
      abstract void Vertex.updateOtherVertexOfRemoval(Vertex<?> connect, Graphs<?,?> graph)
      Say a Vertice A is connected to Vertice B A-----edge------B If A deletes the edge internally, still B has to know that there is no path existing to B, because A has already deleted the path.
